title: Golden queen
creator_credit: Zain Hussain and Malayan Film Unit
brief_description: The pineapple industry in Malaya; harvesting, canning and selling the crop; the organisation of the industry; clearing land for new plantations, planting and caring for the plants; life on the plantation village.
